info.name: Tasty Bites Restaurant API
info.description: This API allows users to manage menu items for the Tasty Bites restaurant, including creating, reading, updating, and deleting menu items.

request.description: Retrieve a list of all menu items available in the restaurant’s database.

response.name: 200 OK — All menu items
response.body:
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Margherita Pizza",
    "description": "Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil",
    "price": 12.99,
    "category": "entree",
    "ingredients": ["Tomato sauce", "Mozzarella", "Basil"],
    "available": true
  }
]

response.name: 500 Internal Server Error

request.description: Retrieve a specific menu item by its ID.

response.name: 200 OK — Single menu item
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "name": "Margherita Pizza",
  "description": "Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil",
  "price": 12.99,
  "category": "entree",
  "ingredients": ["Tomato sauce", "Mozzarella", "Basil"],
  "available": true
}
